name.pehl.gwt.piriti.client.converter
Interface Converter<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The target type for this converter.
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractConverter, BooleanConverter, ByteConverter, CharacterConverter, DateConverter, DoubleConverter, FloatConverter, IntegerConverter, LongConverter, ShortConverter
public interface Converter<T>

Simple converter to convert strings into the specified type T.

Version:
$LastChangedRevision: 7 $
Author:
$LastChangedBy: harald.pehl $

Method Summary
 T convert(String value, String format)
          Converts the specified value to the type T.
 

Method Detail

convert

T convert(String value,
          String format)
Converts the specified value to the type T.

Parameters:
value - The string to be converted
format - An optional format of the value (eg for dates). Should be null if no format is supported
Returns:
The converted type or null if a conversion is not possible
